These are verifiable reservations but are not intended for actual travel unless specified. Users are responsible for understanding the requirements of the embassy or consulate they are applying to.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any account information and for all activities that occur under your account. sections.content: Our refund policy is designed to be fair. Refunds for flight reservations or hotel bookings are only possible if the service has not yet been processed. Once a reservation is confirmed and sent to the user, it is generally non-refundable due to the nature of the service.
